name: Actors And Their Siblings Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: In 1993, I appeared in the movie called 'Even Cowgirls Get The Blues' as Bonanza Jelly Bean. My parents gave me the middle name of Joan of Arc.
questions.explanation:
Rain Phoenix.

	Rain Phoenix was born Rain Joan of Arc Phoenix.

questions.text: In 1998, I was in the movie 'The Faculty'. I was the F*** you Girl. Also, the youngest of the Phoenix clan.
questions.explanation:
Summer Phoenix.

	She was born Summer Joy Phoenix.

questions.text: In 1999, I played Max California in the movie '8MM'. In 2000, I am Commodus in 'Gladiator'.
questions.explanation:
Joaquin Phoenix.

	I was born Joaquin Raphael Phoenix. I have, also, been credited as Leaf Phoenix.

questions.text: The Phoenix family has a daughter with the name Liberty Butterfly Phoenix?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Liberty appeared in a 1986 movie called 'Kate's Secret' about a young girl's struggle with bulimia. She's also known as Liberty Mariposa Phoenix - "Mariposa" is Spanish for butterfly.

questions.text: You knew me as Chris Chambers in 'Stand By Me'. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
River Phoenix & River.

	Sadly, River passed away in 1993 from drug induced heart failure.
